price: 105. Dan (aku telah diperintah), “Hadapkanlah wajahmu kepada agama dengan tulus dan ikhlas, dan jangan sekali-kali engkau termasuk orang yang musyrik.
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddīni ḥanīfan walā takūnanna mina al-mush'rikīna
